title: masterbacon
author: masterbacon
content: ╔═ WELCOME STONER ═╗GoldenArk is a California State licensed grower of Cannabis that supplies licensed dispensaries and the general public with marijuana products grown from the original seeds Ark has collected from around the world. Wishing to make a positive contribution to the development of Web 3.0. technology we stand as an early developer and creator of platforms and products for the metaverse that will be used by millions of individuals in social groups with like interests; defining and shaping the metaverse that is forecasted to be a trillion-dollar industry in just a few short years.╔═ Follow Us ═╗Website | Telegram | Discord $ARK420 IDO is right on the corner. You don't want to miss the opportunity to participate in the cannabis industry. Join our Discord community and learn more details about Golden Ark. Visit the Golden Ark webpage and get ready to participate in our grand IDO event●General RulesCode:IDO Time (UTC)Breed Round : 9/22 04:00 UTC - 9/28 04:00 UTC ($0.048)Leaf Round : 10/5 04:00 UTC - 10/12 04:00 UTC ($0.072)Weed Round : 10/19 04:00 UTC - 10/26 04:00 UTC ($0.1)Airdrop: 10/26 04:00 UTC - 11/02 04:00 UTC (All participate)╔═ To Participate ═╗►ENTER WEB3.0 IDO Website ►Link wallet (support the wallet on BSC chain Metamask, ImToken, TokenPocket, Trust..)►Copy this  referrer address to get special airdrop gifts:  0x6d96574Dc0aed68Dd1f928cf9372C4906363BeC0►Bind the referrer address could be added to the IDO Whitelist. 0x6d96574Dc0aed68Dd1f928cf9372C4906363BeC0(You can’t buy $ARK420 if you are not in the whitelist.)►Prepare both $BNB & $BUSD and buy $ARK420. Become the Golden Ark holders to unlock member benefits! ►If you become the holders, you could get more information, airdrop awards, and limited events memberships! ▌Details ▌Token: $ARK420TokenContract：0xc484b106e838cd7f3507607d8de7e8a08a98598fIDO Pirce: $ 0.048 (Breed round)Hardcap: 10,500,000 $ARK420 (0.25% of supply)Purchase limit：$20~$420 BUSDPair: $ARK420/BUSDTotal Supply: 4,200,000,000 $ARK420▌🌳News ▌ Blockchain Tech Company GoldenArk CEO Mitch Ngo Enters Film Industry In $10 Million Deal With Cherry Blossom Studios Founder Kareem Davis Golden Ark CEO mitch Vision●QuestionsReach out if any questionsPlease feel free to contact us with any questions. The feedback of our community is invaluable in helping us build a better GoldenArkAsia for the future - keep it coming! We are happy to assist you. We look forward to this small step on GoldenArk's path to underpin the trustless token ecosystem of the future!-  GoldenArkAsia Telegram - https://t.me/goldenark_asia_chat
